statements: SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT gene_name, AVG(expression_level) AS average_expression FROM GeneExpressionData GROUP BY gene_name;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 10 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY gene_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level < 5 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY gene_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT analysis_id, species_name FROM ComparativeGenomicAnalysis WHERE species_name = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ComparativeGenomicAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level > 10 ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComparativeGenomicAnalysis WHERE species_name = 'Human' AND analysis_results LIKE '%significant%' ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT gene_id, species_name FROM ComparativeGenomicAnalysis WHERE gene_id = 5 AND species_name IN ('Mouse', 'Rat') ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression_level, MAX(expression_level) AS max_expression_level FROM GeneExpressionData;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level, gene_id FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT sample_name, species FROM sample_data WHERE tissue_type = 'Brain';
SELECT comparison_result FROM comparative_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT sample_name, expression_value FROM sample_data WHERE species = 'Human' AND tissue_type = 'Brain';
SELECT gene_name, sample_name, comparison_result FROM gene_expression_data JOIN comparative_analysis ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = comparative_analysis.gene_id;

SELECT gene_name, expression_level, sample_name, expression_value FROM gene_expression_data JOIN comparative_analysis ON gene_expression_data.gene_id = comparative_analysis.gene_id JOIN sample_data ON comparative_analysis.sample_id = sample_data.sample_id WHERE expression_level > 5 AND expression_value > 15;
SELECT * FROM gene_data;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_data WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_data WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sample_data ORDER BY expression_value DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level, species_name FROM gene_data JOIN species_data ON gene_data.species_id = species_data.species_id;
SELECT * FROM gene_data WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_data WHERE species_id = 2 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level, species_name FROM gene_data INNER JOIN species_data ON gene_data.species_id = species_data.species_id;

SELECT gene_name, expression_level, analysis_name FROM gene_data INNER JOIN sample_data ON gene_data.gene_id = sample_data.gene_id INNER JOIN analysis_results ON sample_data.sample_id = analysis_results.sample_id WHERE expression_level > 0.5;

SELECT species_name, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM gene_data INNER JOIN species_data ON gene_data.species_id = species_data.species_id GROUP BY species_name ORDER BY avg_expression DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressions
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressions
SELECT species_name, genome_size FROM Species, Genomes WHERE Species.species_id = Genomes.species_id
SELECT experiment_name, expression_value FROM Experiments, ExpressionData WHERE Experiments.experiment_id = ExpressionData.experiment_id
SELECT gene_name, expression_value FROM GeneExpressions, ExpressionData WHERE GeneExpressions.gene_id = ExpressionData.gene_id
SELECT * FROM GeneExpressions ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, expression_level FROM GeneExpressions WHERE expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT experiment_name, species_name FROM Experiments INNER JOIN Species ON Experiments.species_id = Species.species_id;
SELECT gene_name, expression_value FROM GeneExpressions GE INNER JOIN ExpressionData ED ON GE.gene_id = ED.gene_id WHERE expression_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_experiments FROM Experiments;
